Title: dotNet Community
Description:
This project is a social network which tries to get together students and professionals of .Net Framework. 

On the other hand, this social network will be an example of using new Microsoft technologies, such as:
  - Windows Azure
  - ASP .NET MVC 1.0
  - Silverlight 3.0
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is a social network which tries to get together students and professionals of .Net Framework.

On the other hand, this social network will be an example of using new Microsoft technologies, such as:
- Windows Azure
- ASP .NET MVC 1.0
- Silverlight 3.0
